plays.text: Goal scored by Arron Asham assisted by Justin Papineau and Oleg Kvasha
Penalty to Eric Cairns 2 minutes for High Sticking Ron Francis
Penalty to Garth Snow 2 minutes for Tripping Ryan Bayda served by Randy Robitaille
Penalty to Eric Cairns 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ryan Bayda
Penalty to Tomas Malec 2 minutes for Holding Steve Webb
Penalty to Steve Webb 2 minutes for Elbowing Tomas Malec
Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Holding Jeff O'Neill
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Hooking Kenny Jonsson
Penalty to Garth Snow 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Josef Vasicek served by Eric Godard
Penalty to Josef Vasicek 2 minutes for Roughing Garth Snow
Penalty to Bruno St. Jacques 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Blake
Goal scored by Radek Martinek assisted by Mark Parrish and Janne Niinimaa
Penalty to Radim Vrbata 2 minutes for Slashing Mattias Weinhandl
Penalty to Justin Papineau 2 minutes for Interference Craig MacDonald
Goal scored by Ryan Bayda assisted by Ron Francis and Jeff O'Neill
